activities: Empower hosts and writes hosted and on premise software for Human Capital Management.  Our software allows our clients to manage their HR/Payroll, Time & Attendance, Scheduling, and other data about their employees.  We also collect marketing information via our website of parties interested in learning about our products.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, clients and customer.  Data processed by clients or automatically.  Marketing data processed manually
